title: Drawing, "Study for the Sala di Apollo, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: At top left in ink, one section of an octagonal ceiling; below in black chalk, one half of octagonal ceiling shown in plan. At top right in ink, an elevation of what may be same room.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study for the Sala di Apollo, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05.
1804–05. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1491.
